title: Mystical Royal Love
description: Authors- P.T. Macias, Darlene Kuncytes, Jami Brumfield, S. L. Bull, C.A. Tibbitts, Bryce Evans, Moira Keith, Margaret Taylor, Julia Mills, Joann H. Buchanan,, Marissa Storm, Tasha T. These short stories are about the eternal fairy tale of the prince and princess. These stories are incredibly steamy romances with paranormal entities mating to claim their royal love. The Mystical Box Set Babes is an Anthology of Paranormal Romance, written by women with very different lives, backgrounds, and talents. This group of amazing, talented authors want to give their readers the royal paranormal romance story. The Mystical Box Set Babes is a Paranormal Romance Anthology. This group of amazing talented authors want to give their readers a Christmas gift.
author: P.T. Macias
